remarks: Decomposition of a positive fraction into numerator and denominator. Similar to ~ dmaddpqlem but also shows that the numerator and denominator are positive integers.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 20-Sep-2019.)
statement:
nqpi $p |- ( A e. Q. -> E. w E. v ( ( w e. N. /\ v e. N. ) /\ A = [ <. w , v >. ] ~Q ) ) $.
$d A v w $.
